title: Girls Trip
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Randi-Lynn thought she was going on a relaxing family vacation to the mountains. Just a few days later, she was hiding in a bathroom and frantically posting on Reddit, asking for help. The headline of her post? "I think I was brought on a girls trip to be brainwashed."
itunes:author: WBUR
itunes:title: Girls Trip
